T02D2492:245b-1: ga na tsa kra bi dhi:/
T02D2492:245b-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2492:245b-4: tshogs rnams bsag par bya ba dang //
T02D2492:245b-5: bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2492:245b-6: bsod nams mthar thug tshogs 'khor lo //
T02D2492:245b-7: lung dang man ngag ji bzhin bri //
T02D2492:245b-8: de la re zhig dang po gzhung mthun pa'i tshogs
T02D2492:245b-9: kyi khang pa tsandan la sogs pa dri zhim pos
T02D2492:245b-10: bskor ba yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su las thams
T02D2492:245b-11: cad pa'i skyes bu lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D2492:245b-16: phyogs skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po la sogs bsham mo //
T02D2492:245b-17: de nas slob dpon spyan drangs la gnas ji ltar rigs pa dang bcas par bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02D2492:245b-18: las thams cad pa'i bum pa rgyan chas dang ldan pa byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2492:245b-19: mchod pa'i bum pa yang ci rigs par bsham mo //
T02D2492:245b-20: de nas rnal 'byor pa 'du bar 'os pa kun bkug la de dag gis gsol ba gdab po //
T02D2492:245b-21: khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste //
T02D2492:245b-22: khyod ni bzang po yid du 'ong //
T02D2492:245b-23: nor bu rin chen ces bcings pa'i //
T02D2492:245b-24: dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste //
T02D2492:245b-25: bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir //
T02D2492:245b-26: dpa' bos gnang gis gtong du gsol //
T02D2492:245b-27: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su //
T02D2492:245b-28: bzang po sgo ni phye ste thong //
T02D2492:245b-29: zhes gsol ba btab nas nang du bkug ste /
T02D2492:245b-30: las kyi bum pa'i chus gtor zhing skyor chu blud do //
T02D2492:246a-0: de nas gral rim pa bzhin du bkod la rdo rje slob dpon la @246a * //
T02D2492:246a-3: rnal 'byor pa kun la yang me tog gtor la bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2492:246a-4: de nas slob dpon gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la
T02D2492:246a-5: mos pa tsam gyis lce lag byin gyis brlab po
T02D2492:246a-6: // rdo rje dang dril bu yang h'um gis byin gyis brlabs la mngon par rtogs pa brjod /
T02D2492:246a-7: h'um thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2492:246a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2492:246a-9: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2492:246a-10: rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i gtso //
T02D2492:246a-13: a'a: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02D2492:246a-14: ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D2492:246a-15: srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed //
T02D2492:246a-17: de nas mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad 'bru gsum gyi byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2492:246a-18: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D2492:246a-19: bla ma dang bcas pa'i lha rnams nam mkha' la
T02D2492:246a-23: me tog nas sgra snyan gyi bar du rim pas mchod do //
T02D2492:246a-24: de nas de kho na lnga'am /
T02D2492:246a-25: gzhung gang yin pas bstod pa bya /
T02D2492:246a-26: yan lag bdun pa mdo rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba bya'o //
T02D2492:246a-27: yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2492:246a-28: de nas sh'u n+ya t'a'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
T02D2492:246a-29: yi ge h'um gi snang ba las ra ba dang dra ba dang sa gzhir bsgoms la /
T02D2492:246a-30: de nas 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri rab rin po che'i rang bzhin bsgoms la /
T02D2492:246a-31: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02D2492:246a-32: de'i lte ba la bh'um las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par bskyed nas /
T02D2492:246a-33: der gang yin pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye
T02D2492:246a-34: shes kyi lha spyan drangs te mchod nas dbyer med
T02D2492:246a-35: par bstim mo // de nas chang la srung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin byas te /
T02D2492:246a-36: yi ge ha dmar pos kha dog sbyangs la /
T02D2492:246a-37: ho dkar pos dri ngan bsal te hr'i: mthing gas
T02D2492:246a-38: nus pa bcom nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur
T02D2492:246a-39: par bsams la / de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis
T02D2492:246a-40: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste bsti bstim mo
T02D2492:246a-41: par bsams la / // de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil
T02D2492:246a-42: 'khor gyi lha la so so'i ming nas brjod cing
T02D2492:246a-43: par bsams la / // mchod de // de nas
T02D2492:246b-0: @246b bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i srin lag gis mandala
T02D2492:246b-1: gru gsum bris la der bdud rtsi gtor bas zla
T02D2492:246b-2: ba'i gdan phyogs mtshams su gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2492:246b-3: der ye shes 'khor lo mos pa tsam gyis bsams la bdud rtsis mchod /
T02D2492:246b-4: de nas bdag nyid la mchod de 'di ltar mtheb
T02D2492:246b-5: srin gyis lce rtse dang smin ma'i dbus dang spyi
T02D2492:246b-6: bor gtor ro // de nas de dag mi dmigs
T02D2492:246b-7: par bsams la gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor la yon chab
T02D2492:246b-8: la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis mchod de bstod pa
T02D2492:246b-9: byas te gshegs su mi gsol lo //
T02D2492:246b-10: de nas zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma rgya chen
T02D2492:246b-11: po btang ste yi ge 'bru gsum gyis spyang ba
T02D2492:246b-13: rtogs par byas la mandala thig btab pa'i le'u tse
T02D2492:246b-14: dgu par byas te dbus ma la ye shes kyi
T02D2492:246b-15: 'khor lo bsam / phyogs mtshams la zhing skyong brgyad /
T02D2492:246b-16: ma mo sum cu gnyis dang bcas pa spyan drangs la mchod do //
T02D2492:246b-17: aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D2492:246b-18: ri bo dang ni ri sul phug / grong dang bzhi mdo nyid dang ni //
T02D2492:246b-19: khyad par du ni khang stong dang //
T02D2492:246b-20: rigs ngan khyim dang thang dang ni //
T02D2492:246b-21: khyad par du ni chu la gnas //
T02D2492:246b-22: nag po drag po drag chen po //
T02D2492:246b-23: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02D2492:246b-24: nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug pa //
T02D2492:246b-26: rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang //
T02D2492:246b-27: mi sdug ma dang dbu ma dang //
T02D2492:246b-28: rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang //
T02D2492:246b-29: mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D2492:246b-30: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
T02D2492:246b-31: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2492:246b-32: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02D2492:246b-33: rab tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo //
T02D2492:246b-34: 'phrog byed ma dang dmar ser ma //
T02D2492:246b-36: drag mo gzugs dang gzugs chen mo //
T02D2492:246b-37: mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma //
T02D2492:246b-38: thod phreng phreng can kha tv'am ma //
T02D2492:246b-39: sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can //
T02D2492:246b-40: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma //
T02D2492:246b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' chen po //
T02D2492:246b-42: las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma //
T02D2492:246b-43: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso //
T02D2492:246b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen de //
T02D2492:246b-46: rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis //
T02D2492:246b-47: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig / aom kakka dh'a na ba bandha na /
T02D2492:246b-49: sarba du sht'am ha na ha na /
T02D2492:247a-2: aa mu ka h'um dza: zhes pas bkug la padma'i gdan la gnas par bsams la /
T02D2492:247a-3: mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs la de nyid dbul te /
T02D2492:247a-4: so so'i lce h'um las rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
T02D2492:247a-5: pa'i rdo rje'i sbu gu'i 'od kyis bdud rtsi mchod
T02D2492:247a-6: par bsams la chos bshad de /
T02D2492:247a-7: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2492:247a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02D2492:247a-9: de nas smon lam gdab ste /
T02D2492:247a-10: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D2492:247a-11: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis //
T02D2492:247a-12: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog / ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bya //
T02D2492:247a-13: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2492:247a-14: de ltar nyid du rjes brtse bas //
T02D2492:247a-15: rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod //
T02D2492:247a-16: ces pas bsngo ba byas la gshegs su mi gsol lo //
T02D2492:247a-17: de nas rnal 'byor pa pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la dang por dris mchod /
T02D2492:247a-18: de nas me tog dang bdug pa dang /
T02D2492:247a-19: mar mes tshul bzhin du mchod /
T02D2492:247a-20: de nas bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang gis mchod de /
T02D2492:247a-21: de nas lag pa g-yas par chang bzung la g-yon
T02D2492:247a-22: pa rtse gsum par byas te tshig 'dis chang sbyin
T02D2492:247a-23: te / ltos shig mdzes pa dam tshig chos //
T02D2492:247a-24: de la the tshom yod ma yin //
T02D2492:247a-25: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum //
T02D2492:247a-26: rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pas bza' //
T02D2492:247a-29: 'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i //
T02D2492:247a-30: rin thang med las legs 'ong chos //
T02D2492:247a-31: gzung dang 'dzin med rnam par spangs //
T02D2492:247a-32: de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2492:247a-33: zhes brjod la pad kor dang bcas pas blang ngo //
T02D2492:247a-34: de nas 'og ma rnams drang ba la 'di skad brjod de /
T02D2492:247a-35: sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni //
T02D2492:247a-36: sbyor kun de nyid de bzhin du //
T02D2492:247a-37: rnal 'byor pa yis kun du spyad //
T02D2492:247a-38: ji ltar bde ba spyad par bya /
T02D2492:247a-40: de'i 'og tu sha dang mar la sogs pas mchod do //
T02D2492:247a-41: de nas bshos so sor drangs la de dag kun gyi phud bsdus la slob dpon la dbul /
T02D2492:247a-42: slob dpon gyis phud de cha gnyis su bgos la /
T02D2492:247b-0: g-yon phyogs su bzhag ste dkyil 'khor @247b gyi lha la dbul /
T02D2492:247b-1: cha gcig g-yas su bzhag la byin gyis brlabs te phyogs skyong gi gtor mar dbul te /
T02D2492:247b-2: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod la /
T02D2492:247b-3: de nas ci bder rol zhing spyad do //
T02D2492:247b-4: skabs der bkra shis kyi glu blang ngo //
T02D2492:247b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang phyogs skyong la
T02D2492:247b-6: gnang ba nod pa dang bzod gsol byas la gshegs
T02D2492:247b-7: su gsol lo // de nas ye shes kyi lha
T02D2492:247b-8: la yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas la badzra
T02D2492:247b-9: mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2492:247b-10: dam tshig gi lha la aom a'atma tishtha h'um zhes brjod la bdag gi snying gar bsdu'o //
T02D2492:247b-11: aom sarba du shta grihna gatstsha h'um zhes pas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2492:247b-12: de nas lhag ma bsdus te khyim gyi lhag ma
T02D2492:247b-13: ni khyim de nyid kyi mi ma yin pa la
T02D2492:247b-14: bsngo'o // rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lhag ma ni
T02D2492:247b-15: phyi rol gyi sha za la sogs pa'i mi ma
T02D2492:247b-16: yin pa rnams la sbyin te phyi'i sgor bskyal lo
T02D2492:247b-17: bsngo'o // // lhag ma de lta bu bza' ba'i
T02D2492:247b-18: skal ba med pa la yang slob dpon gyi kha
T02D2492:247b-20: de nas yon bdag la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab po //
T02D2492:247b-21: de nas gtor skyel log pa dang tshogs kyi khang pa'i sgor me long dang bud dkrol dang /
T02D2492:247b-22: chu chan gyi zho dang zan gyis mchod do //
T02D2492:247b-23: de nas nang du phyin la rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams la yang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2492:247b-24: ma 'ongs skye bo gang dag tshogs rnams bsag par 'dod pa dang //
T02D2492:247b-25: bslab pa'i lam la nges par zhugs pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2492:247b-26: po dag gi / dri med lung dang bla ma'i
T02D2492:247b-27: gdams ngag ltar // ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir du bris pa yin //
T02D2492:247b-28: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2492:247b-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pa de nyid dang /
